summary: The course is a hybrid workshop for data managers, offered by Bar-Ilan University, focusing on Data Science and Generative AI for technological managers. It covers a comprehensive range of topics including an overview of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, supervised and unsupervised learning, model selection, deep learning, and reinforcement learning. Participants will learn about the complete data science pipeline process, managing data science initiatives, building and managing data science units, and successful organizational ML-OPS processes. The course also delves into data science tools and technologies, industry and market trends, real-world use cases, and best practices. It includes a focus on large language models, generative AI solutions, and key approaches such as prompt engineering and retrieval-augmented generation. The course is designed to equip managers with the knowledge to efficiently manage data science operations and leverage cutting-edge AI technologies.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Data Science & GenAI for Technological Managers.

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is designed to equip technological managers with the necessary skills in data science and generative AI. It is hosted by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 19.12.2024.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Duration: 5 sessions totaling 25 academic hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- The course is hybrid, offering both on-campus sessions at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and online sessions via Zoom.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Data Science: 
  - Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Overview.
  - Supervised, Unsupervised, and Semi-Supervised Learning.
  - Model Selection including Straightforward Models and Ensembled Models.
  - Deep Learning: Neural Networks Concepts & Engineering.
  - Reinforcement Learning.
  - The complete data science pipeline process.

- Data Science Operation Management: 
  - Managing Data Science Initiatives Life Cycle.
  - Building and Managing the Data Science Unit efficiently.
  - Successful organizational ML-OPS process.
  - Data Science Tools & Technologies.

- Data Science Tools & Technologies: 
  - Industry & Market watch.
  - Real-world use cases & Best Practices.
  - Large Language Models (NLP / NLU) and Omni Models.
  - Generative AI: off-the-shelf solutions, platforms, self-development, and in between.
  - Key approaches: Prompt Engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Preferences Fine-Tuning (PFT), Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT), etc.
  - Project Milestones, Technologies & Process (e.g., Tokenization, embedding, Vector DBs, etc).

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- For scheduling an admission interview and registration, contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University is committed to shaping the future today.
